forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 13 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 7 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under a brilliant canopy of blue, dotted with hints of cottony clouds drifting lazily across the skyline. The sun casts its warm glow, teasing out flecks of golden light from the city’s iconic structures against the backdrop of the distant Golden Gate. While the temperature rests comfortably near sixty-four, a soft breeze stirs, bringing with it the invigorating scent of the bay and hints of the ocean beyond. As the afternoon wanes, expect a slight dip in warmth, nudging the mercury down to a cozy sixty-two, while the cool westerly winds—a gentle reminder of the maritime influence—dance around at a modest thirteen miles per hour.

As evening approaches, the city's vibrant pulse continues unabated, though the clouds will weave together to create a more muted, softly lit atmosphere. The anticipated low of fifty-four introduces a comforting chill, encouraging layers of warmth; consider donning a light jacket or a cozy cardigan as the sun dips below the horizon. With such delightful weather, an evening stroll along the Embarcadero beckons, as do quiet conversations over coffee at one of the chic cafes tucked away in Yerba Buena Gardens. Enjoying the sights, smells, and sounds of the city while the world settles into the soft embrace of twilight provides the perfect antidote to the day.
